BaselineAnomaly.description: BaselineAnomaly describes a detected deviation from historical baseline.

multiplier.description: Ratio of current count to baseline mean.

zScore.description: Number of standard deviations from the mean.

BaselineStats.description: BaselineStats contains the running statistics for a baseline key.

sampleCount.description: Number of samples incorporated so far.

stdDev.description: Standard deviation derived from Welford's M2.

BaselineUpdate.description: BaselineUpdate is a single metric observation to incorporate into the running baseline.

CableHealthEvidence.description: CableHealthEvidence represents a single piece of evidence supporting a health assessment.

ts.description: Evidence timestamp, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

CableHealthRecord.description: CableHealthRecord contains the computed health status and supporting evidence for a cable.

lastUpdated.description: Last signal update time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

score.description: Composite health score (0.0 = healthy, 1.0 = confirmed fault).

status.description: CableHealthStatus represents the computed health status of a submarine cable.

Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GeoCoordinates.description: GeoCoordinates represents a geographic location using WGS84 coordinates.

GetCableHealthRequest.description: GetCableHealthRequest requests the current health status of all monitored submarine cables.

GetCableHealthResponse.description: GetCableHealthResponse contains health status for submarine cables with active signals.

cables.description: Health records keyed by cable identifier.

generatedAt.description: Generation timestamp, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

GetTemporalBaselineRequest.description: GetTemporalBaselineRequest checks current activity count against stored baseline.

count.description: Current observed count to compare against baseline.

GetTemporalBaselineResponse.description: GetTemporalBaselineResponse returns anomaly info or learning status.

error.description: Error message if request was invalid.

learning.description: True if insufficient samples have been collected.

samplesNeeded.description: Minimum samples required before anomaly detection activates.

InternetOutage.description: InternetOutage represents a detected internet outage event from Cloudflare Radar.

detectedAt.description: Detection time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

endedAt.description: End time of the outage, as Unix epoch milliseconds. Zero if ongoing.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

severity.description:
OutageSeverity represents the severity of an internet outage.
 Maps to TS union: 'partial' | 'major' | 'total'.

ListInternetOutagesRequest.description: ListInternetOutagesRequest specifies filters for retrieving internet outages.

ListInternetOutagesResponse.description: ListInternetOutagesResponse contains internet outages matching the request.

ListServiceStatusesRequest.description: ListServiceStatusesRequest specifies filters for retrieving service statuses.

status.description: ServiceOperationalStatus represents the current status of a service.

PaginationRequest.description: PaginationRequest specifies cursor-based pagination parameters for list endpoints.

cursor.description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string for the first page.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (1 to 100).

PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata returned alongside list results.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string indicates no more pages.

totalCount.description: Total count of items matching the query, if known. Zero if the total is unknown.

RecordBaselineSnapshotRequest.description: RecordBaselineSnapshotRequest batch-updates baselines using Welford's online algorithm.

RecordBaselineSnapshotResponse.description: RecordBaselineSnapshotResponse reports how many baselines were successfully updated.

error.description: Error message if the request was invalid.

updated.description: Number of baselines that were written.

ServiceStatus.description: ServiceStatus represents the operational status of a monitored external service.

checkedAt.description: Last status check time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

status.description: ServiceOperationalStatus represents the current status of a service.

TimeRange.description:
TimeRange represents a time interval defined by a start and end timestamp.
 Used for filtering data within a specific time period.

end.description: End of the time range (inclusive), as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

start.description: Start of the time range (inclusive), as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

post.description: GetCableHealth computes health status for submarine cables from NGA maritime warning signals.
GetTemporalBaseline checks current activity count against stored baseline for anomaly detection.
ListInternetOutages retrieves detected internet outages from Cloudflare Radar.
ListServiceStatuses retrieves operational status of monitored external services.
RecordBaselineSnapshot batch-updates baseline statistics using Welford's online algorithm.
